website_summaries.verdict: An excellent option for those looking for a brace with medium support.
pros: This brace stands out for being well-made,providing good stability, and being a good value for the cost
Users found it to be comfortable to wear and that it helped to relieve pain
cons: Tends to have an initial synthetic smell
some customers felt it was difficult to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to wait 3 more weeks for shoulder replacement surgery and is in agony. I bought this as a last ditch effort to help him during the wait since pain pills, ice, heat nor anything else he tried gave him any pain relief. He hasn’t slept in weeks. Omg! He is not totally pain free but is so much better with this shoulder brace. Both of us are very grateful. Hope it helps him get through until his surgery.
customer_reviews.author: mcbarbee

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend that needs shoulder surgery (shoulder dislocates once a week) and he absolutely LOVES it!!!!! It has been a life saver until he gets his surgery. No dislocate has happened since purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Great for older guys too !!
customer_reviews.text: works great for me .....I use it under my uniform shirt all day long and it gives me the support I need. At my age [54] it's a great help, as I work a full [11-12 hr] workday as an automotive technician in a very busy shop. If you need the support, you won't go wrong getting this product !!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brace. Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brace. Fits true to size. Very comfortable and wearable all day. The only drawback is that the adjustable arm cuff is difficult to adjust because it is underneath your arm. The strap itself does cause some irritation, but otherwise it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife made all the adjustments and it fit like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Along with ice and rest, this brace was key to stabilizing my shoulder and clearing up my tendonitis. I had originally thought that I had torn a rotator. Burpees and planks with a Bosa ball that was over-inflated. After a doctor examined it I was relieved that it was tendonitis. The ice help 50%, this Should brace was another 50%. Further stretching improved range of motion. Wearing it to bed help significantly with the healing. Get someone to help you with all the possible adjustments. My wife made all the adjustments and it fit like a charm. No chaffing or circulation issues.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroku-hiroku

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product if you have shoulder pain or a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps my shoulder pain in check. I highly recommend this product if you have shoulder pain or a tendency towards tendinitis or other joint related problems. Only issue was the strap on the bicep dug into my skin / armipit, but was fixed easily with some padded, which also helped withe compression. Great for exercise! My shoulder tends to (obviously ) be at it's worse after a strenuous upper body work out. This product has helped tremendously I Hope it does so for you too.
customer_reviews.author: Will Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, as I do a lot of upper body movement all day at my job. Have only worn it for 1 week, so I can't really tell it's helping long term yet. I do know that when I wear it, I have less shoulder pain. Long term effects, we'll wait and see. Service was great. Arrived sooner than I thought it would. I did get a slight rash over my shoulder, so now I just wear it over my clothes. It does say though, to wear it under clothes. I may just have to wait for my body to adjust to the material. Nothing real bothersome, just slightly itchy. No whining allowed!!
customer_reviews.author: Busy nurse

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this brace/shoulder support would work but it has been awesome. I strained my rotator cuff and it hurt to just extend my arm. This support has added enough support for my shoulder and kept it in position enough for it to heal. The extra support on top the shoulder even helps by holding an ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lee VerDoorn Jr.

customer_reviews.title: LIVE AGAIN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This is a LIFE SAVER!!! For anyone who tears their AC Joint or sprains it, this is the product for you!!!! The sling that you get from the hospital or ER has very minimal support! This brace allows me to LIVE. MY. LIFE. again! Especially since I was struggling running around with my non-dominant left arm! The other sling would force me to over compensate with my chest and back muscles, causing them to lock after awhile. NOT FUN AT ALL! And yes, painful. I definitely recommend this product! Feels great, fits great. I weigh 200lbs. 5'10"
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Quisumbing

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro is nice and the rest of the fabric is soft
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skinny dude and that makes the brace a little uncomfortable. That being said, I don't think any other product would be different. This one is at least adjustable so I can make it fit. The Velcro is nice and the rest of the fabric is soft. I'm pretty sure the ice or hot pack pocket will come in handy but I haven't tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Gaudreau

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder brace works very well. It helps me when I working on the job and around the house. I would recomend this brace to any one who is having problems lifting and mobility in the shoulder,great product.
customer_reviews.author: tim cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Pain saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently injured his shoulder and is waiting on surgery. In the meantime, he needed something to remind him to keep his shoulder still and to keep it as immobile as possible. This brace did the trick. It's easy to put on an adjust and he says it is very comfortable. Happy to find this item and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a shoulder brace; it's designed for inserting ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a shoulder brace; it's designed for inserting an ice pack and holding it in place. If you order this looking for shoulder support, you aren't going to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Runs large & if it doesn’t fit, it’s of no use to you
customer_reviews.text: Was too large although I ordered as directed. I cannot use this. I believe it would be wonderful if it fit. I did not return it due to the news reporting Amazon removing people for even a few returns. This will make me much less likely to purchase any clothes or something of this nature. Not a good thing Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Miller

customer_reviews.title: Seam for buckle came undone...
customer_reviews.text: COME ON....really? I thought I finally got some relief when this arrived, but literally within 5 minutes of opening my package and trying to set this up, the seam on one of the buckles comes undone... It’s obviously a departure from all the praises this item is getting here, but damn, just my luck to get THE faulty one. Frustrating to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seam on day 20
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the 20 days before it started to rip of use over clothing use. It has not gone through the washing machine.. It did help. I am a male 6'3 215 pounds. Returning. Too bad it wasn't made better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing was incredibly uncomfortable and thus completely useless for what it's meant to be used for. If you don't look like the model in the picture expect this brace to really dig into your skin long before it provides any real stability to your shoulder at which point you're just replacing one pain for another.
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for post rotator cup surgery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the thought it might help support my shoulder after the sling came off after rotator cup surgery. It caused me to experience more pain in the shoulder. at 5 weeks post sling removal - still hurts the shoulder. Thought I try it again a 8 weeks, my shoulder now can tolerate the brace. Doesn't work well as an ice pack holder on the shoulder even if you find the right size of ice packs to fit it. Tried both small diameter icepacks and larger ice packs, neither passes the cold very well through the brace fabric.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my particular injury.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it would be fine for a number of shoulder injuries, just not the one I have. I have a minor supraspinatus tear from bench pressing; external rotation of the shoulder is very painful. I was looking for something stronger than K tape that would force the shoulder back to keep it from rubbing against the acromion. Unfortunately, the chest strap is useless for this, since there is no way to make the back tighter than the front. It needs a second strap to do this. Maybe I will try to invent something..
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is not comfortable and digs in under your arms. It is also hard to put on. I hoped it would help hold my arm and shoulder stable when when I was in pain. Broke my arm a while ago and this causes more pain because it digs into your skin. I have tried adjusting it and even looked up instructions on several websites.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace for my husband, he has a very strenuous, labor intensive job and his shoulder has been bothering him. He tried using this for a day or two on jobs around the house, unfortunately, the velcro tabs were not strong enough and kept opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT provide compression, only support. Description should not ready "compression sleeve". Perhaps if you are super buff, or of a larger build, this will be tight enough to be considered compression, but for normal people like me, this cannot be tightened enough to compress the shoulder. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: This actually works better than i thought it would. MY old one i had got ruined so i had to buy a new one and wasn't trying to spend $60+. But compared to shock Doctor this shoulder support is pretty comfortable and helps a lot with stability. I've had two shoulder surgery's one the same shoulder for my rotator cuff twice and my bicep, my posterior labrum and anterior labrum twice so stability is a huge thing for me and this actually made a difference. It could be a little softer for comfort but all and all its nice i just need to use it some more and break it in.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Helms

customer_reviews.title: not what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Well number !. they say they care about their product and will contact you about it and what you think. Well, that has not and did not as of this time happened. Number 2. the stitching came apart within two weeks after receiving the product. I can't seem to find anyway to contact them about a refund. Number 3 it does not relieve the pain nor help in anyway and it's difficult yo adjust with just one hand. Requires a second persons help and still not great in doing what it is suppose to do. Number 4 in other words not happy with product and hope this can get resolved with making a return and money back.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: My husband's rotator cuff is torn but because he is the sole breadwinner he has to wait until this upcoming winter to get surgery. The pain is nearly unbearable for him so I ordered this in the hopes of providing him with some much needed relief. So far so good. It is very well made with nice, heavy duty velcro that holds the straps secure. It is completely adjustable to suit his needs. I would wholeheartedly recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Thrill peeker

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver/ less pain
customer_reviews.text: I have EDS so I sublex and dislocate. This brace Holds my shoulder in pretty good. Less pulling in neck and less headaches. Can get a bit warm in the summer. Material is ok..not that breathable. But still helps hold in shoulder. I fit in a woman’s small to Med so it might be a little big. Is adjustable tho. Once I fit it to me..I had to put some stitches through some of the velcro to hold. And had to shorten the strap around the chest area. Even tho I had to modify it...it’s still a lifesaver for shoulder issues. And good price.
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Eases pain, comfortable all day
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate to severe pain in my shoulder. This lowers that from a screaming pain to a more manageable level. Additionally, this is suitable for larger people like me. It remains comfortable while working all day. There was no chafing or uncomfortable stickiness even in a warehouse environment in a hot and very humid part of the US. I didn't expect a cure, but I did expect relief. I got that. I recommend this, and will likely unfortunately need a second one sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Pavlovich

customer_reviews.title: I had been having progressively bad left shoulder pains
customer_reviews.text: I had been having progressively bad left shoulder pains. I finally decided I needed a brace. Used this for the first time today and I LOVE IT (compared to the one from Vive). It really did help a lot with the pain in my shoulder. I clean houses and when I removed it, my shoulder did not hurt at all. It has been 4 hours since I took it off and my shoulder is still happy. The only one drawback is, I wish the strap for the underarm was strapped from back to front, rather than from front to back. It is so difficult to adjust the arm strap with the velcro from front to back.
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design And Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: The product is uncomfortable and doesn't fit well. I had to wear a t-shirt under it at all times, which gets bunched up. When I didn't wear a tee, the straps would dig into the skin under my arm. Also, the Velcro doesn't stick well initially, and stopped sticking entirely after minimal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a year now, and like it initially but i see many design flaws. The arm straps are too short and velcro will eventually fail. I am medium built so if you a heavy build, it will be much more of a nuisance. The other strap that wraps around your waist is too long that ends up wrapping under your armpit which gives me wedgies. The should make the arm straps longer and the waist strap shorter. But oh well. the search continues
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Dislocated my shoulder wearing this thing
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple shoulder dislocations due to snowboarding and I did not expect this brace to prevent them completely, but to at least stabilizing my arm. I usually do not tight it too much because the straps simply do not allow you to and this weekend going on a jump, my shoulder dislocated in the air just for lifting my arm too high (which I hoped this thing would not allow). Thankfully I landed the jump with a dislocated shoulder and didn't get any other injuries but I am pretty disappointed with this product regardless because it should prevent me from lifting my arm so high, if not what is the purpose of this?
customer_reviews.author: Luiz S.

customer_reviews.title: helped to heal Rotator cuff tear
customer_reviews.text: I had three significant tears in my rotator cuff. I opted not to have surgery. Used this brace to stabilize my shoulder for about two weeks. after I slowly began physical therapy exercises. It's been a year and I have no pain and total range of motion. I still am careful how I move the arm, but happy to not have surgery.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for shoulder rehab
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder brace has been very helpful in my bursitis rehabilitation. It holds the shoulder in place well, and it fits my tall frame quite well. My only two complaints are some minor chaffing from the band under the arm opposite the shoulder being braced; and the terrible quality of the included directions -- one printed sheet in a tiny low-contrast font is not sufficient for a medical device.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vargish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dislocated shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: If your shoulder is not mobile. If you have issues with range of motion. I highly recommend using this product. It's durable and can handle a lot of exercises. It fits fairly well and I can't believe how much it stretches to accommodate bigger guys. I love the way it fits. Do not be cheap with the items you use on yourself. This item is A+
customer_reviews.author: Mickel Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to stop wearing it as it kept irritating his arm pit on the opposite arm. Where it hit on him made it uncomfortable after a small amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Lynda A Scott

customer_reviews.title: My situation isnt the best to give a full review
customer_reviews.text: I had labrum surgery july 2019 I bought this feb of 2020 bc I had pain when I started work again (painter) Come to find out i had torn my labrum again so I cant say it helped with the pain. It was very firm and helped me not to over exercise it. I would have gave it a 4 star but it rubbed my armpit raw. On bare skin and over clothing
customer_reviews.author: Ariel and kirk

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The Babo shoulder brace is comfortable and functional but it didn't even last more than three weeks before tearing at the seam located on the broad side of the shoulder. The torn seam runs horizontal and is underneath the therapy cold pack straps. I feel like I have wasted my money since it has now become useless to me and I'm not sure how the warranty will work yet but I will try to get a full refund. If you are going to sit around and relax while wearing this then it should work fine. But if you are looking for a shoulder brace to use during any kind of labor then I recommend to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good support for your shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brace almost all of my waking hours since I received it because it helps. I have significant shoulder pain due to extensive muscle tearing. I find the brace comforting and supportive. I also slide magnets inside next to my skin for extra benefit. It is easy to adjust initially and easy to put on with only one hand. The Velcro is quality and seems very secure. I am a PT and have seen many soft braces. I recognize the quality in the construction.
customer_reviews.author: GLee Alford

customer_reviews.title: Dislocated shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brace because I dislocated my shoulder about 10 years ago and occasionally I will re injure and agrivate the shoulder. This brace works well to take the weight of the arm off the shoulder joint and help to keep it in place. Really helps to relieve some of the pain an irritation and does limit the movement of the shoulder. As far as braces goes this one is not very uncomfortable to wear all day. I wore it mostly while I was at work and I am moving around and on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with a small flaw
customer_reviews.text: The material is very comfortable and keeps my shoulders feeling secure. The only flaw is that adjusting the shorter strap is not easy by myself. It would be nice if the shorter strap had the same hook & pull set up like the long strap. Lastly, in Korean “babo” means stupid so... it keeps me in check to be humble and not flail my arm around that got me in this situation in the first place. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: great brace.
customer_reviews.text: Brace was initially awkward to fit to body, but once figured out and adjusted it really presented itself capably. has helped me with a recurring shoulder issue. my only issues are with the velcro, as i believe the snugness of the velcro will wear away after months of use and also the strap which connect to the main part should have offered more adjustability, but otherwise this was a great buy and has helped alleviate a very painful shoulder instability.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allwood

customer_reviews.title: I’m afraid the durability isn’t very good, or maybe this one is just defective
customer_reviews.text: This did help with my shoulder pain. The problem I had was the seam started unraveling after just a few uses. I’m afraid the durability isn’t very good, or maybe this one is just defective.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea who wrote the instructions for this strap but they were so poorly written that I had to guess what I needed to do. After finally figuring it out (hopefully) the device didn't offer the support I needed without cutting off my circulation so I ended up returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: CoquiLostInNY

customer_reviews.title: Can work, but its uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It works to stabilize my shoulder / rotor cuff injury, how ever it seems to be way to large of strap material and i'm 6'2 260 lbs. The parts that go under both arms are not padded at all and tend to creep up and cause poor circulation. I'll be looking for a different unit to fix those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rathgeber

customer_reviews.title: Totally uncomfortable, better off with compression shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry, but I don’t feel much support. It actually causes me pain by pushing in on my deltoid and shoulder. You’d probably be better off with a compression shirt.
customer_reviews.author: L. P

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and designed
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give this a 5 was it did not fit me, it was too large. It is well made & designed & quality material were used for it's construction. It is adjustable but it was to large for me and kept slipping down. I think it would great for a larger female or a man . I also tried to wear it over my running tights, it may have fit better if I wore it over my jeans or other clothing. The price charged was reasonable. I retuned this item and it was a hassle free return. I would buy from this seller again ,
customer_reviews.author: northwoods woman

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for smaller torsos
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product was much too large for me. I’m a 5’5 female and not very big in the upper torso and I had to pull the strap so far that it became uncomfortable. Also, because of the size on me, it rested in an uncomfortable position underneath my arm directly on an artery and caused my arm to go numb. I was able to return the item without any hassles.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This definately can fit a very large person/ chest. I'm 32 inches around and I can overlap the straps to the strap loops. It's very comfortable. I got it to wear at night so my shoulder doesnt roll forward when I sleep on my side. I wear it to work when my shoulder has a lot of pain or it "sags" down, causing a lot of pain throughout my upper shoulders. It lifts my shoulder back up & gets rid of the pain so I can work with ease. It doesnt restrict movement like other braces.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Not uncomfortable, supports well
customer_reviews.text: Wore this a hot summer season while a tinge of rotator cuff was starting in and it and was not chaffed or uncomfortable in it. Washes up well and served as a good reminder not to lift my arm range until I healed completely. Which I did. Wore it three weeks and iced at night. Have been nursing same shoulder for 20 years. This new product in my line to stay out of surgery did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay too big
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well-constructed and would be easy to use after sizing it. Would require an assistant to adjust the pressure pad for the first wearing. Sized for people 200 ls and larger. I’m 165 lbs and was unable to magic a way to make it fit. Chest strap was a foot too long and the shoulder cuff was at least 4 inches too big.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G Mills

customer_reviews.title: Had shoulder pain. Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I had some anterior and lateral shoulder pain with the motion of throwing a right hook. I stopped lifting heavy but I found my self lifting things at work or moving my shoulder a certain way which hindered my healing. I wore this for about 2 months and my shoulder pain is gone. I also did some pt i found online and hanging from a pull up bar helped alot
customer_reviews.author: Kwame Doss

customer_reviews.title: My doctor did not recommend me using this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as it indicated it would help with my shoulder in terms of inflammation and allows for range of motion. I hurt myself during a move with lifting heavy items and now have serious injury of bursitis and bone spur. I tried it on and it felt great! Regarding comfort, I am not sure as it is slung over my chest and therefore pushes my bossom a little lower. I like that it allows for adjusting for any size. Overall, I do like the item so I will keep it just in case I need it in the future. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: They're is no way I could put this on by myself. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Vesley

customer_reviews.title: Good Support!
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable support. Easy to figure out how to put on after a couple times, but it would be nice to initially have clearer and readable instructions on how to put it on correctly. The printing is extremely small on the photos and can barely be read with a magnifying glass. Need clearer, step by step and readable use instructions or a YouTube video.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: if any of these are comfortable. I strained a ligament and muscle coming out of rotator cuff. Blah blah,, boring stuff.... lol. Took a few monthes. I used the brace on days I over did my job. 5 months later I'm still mending. Havent worn the brace in over a month Worth the nominal cost, over $$$$$in physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dad with everyday tasks
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad, he’s 65 and shoulder surgery is not even a discussion topic. I got him this shoulder strap so he could at least perform light duty work around the house. As soon as I placed it on him he said he could stand up a lot straighter than he could without it. He now feels more confident bumping shoulders with his buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant Odor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the brace has an oder that is very unpleasant, and my wife refuses to wear it for that reason. As I bought it for her, I've had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ACTUAL SPORT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my shoulder pain management and I was intending to use it for sports and I used it only once in playing vollyball and guess what?? It ripped... and thats too whitin a month of purchase. I am very disappointed with my purchase and wouldn't recommend it to buy for motion aggressive game, otherwise, its just a strap of fabric which you can tie around your shoulder all day long without actually using your HANDS. I think I shouldn't have been intimidated by those reviews🤔
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Helps my husband with his shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who really needs a shoulder replacement, but is too stubborn to have the surgery done. This brace provides him with a lot of pain relief, and gives him a better range of motion. The only problem is that my husband is fairly thin, and the strap that goes around his body is a little too long to stay snug. I will alter it myself, but I thought you might like to know if you are a narrow body person.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I have had injuries to my rotator cuff before and recently injured it again. I decided to get something because I was working a job that put a lot of load and stress on my shoulders. While this does great for hanging support it is rather uncomfortable to wear and work continuously moving the arm. It tends to wedge up in the armpit to get the desired shoulder support so long term wearing gets uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hatheway

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. I wish I could get a refund
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a month and it has already started to fall apart. It doesn't fit anything like the photo. It barely helps. I have been trying to see if it just needed time but it was a complete waste of my money. I wish I could get a refund. Its cheaply made and doesn't do its job and does NOT fit like the one shown in the photo. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Corrar

customer_reviews.title: Effective & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this brace. I have joint instability in my left shoulder which is my weak arm and this really helps me get through the active parts of my day. Not at all uncomfortable when sized and worn properly. I'd recommend for guys to keep the affected arms hair trimmed due to a little discomfort from chafing, but thats not a product flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L.

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: My husband dislocated his shoulder a long time ago and when it hurts he puts it in and it puts pressure on his shoulder and keeps it confortable
customer_reviews.author: Karina ayala

customer_reviews.title: Provides good support
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and very adjustable. It is inconspicuous under clothes (not invisible, but not super noticeable). Provides good support to limit (or at least remind you) to reduce your motions while providing warmth to help your injury heal. Flexible to be able to function, but also supportive enough to resist overuse.
customer_reviews.author: B4eeL

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: provides relief to your shoulder, i injured my shoulder some time back and it needs proper rehab and support. this brace has been providing nice grip and support. grip can be adjusted and can be tighten or loosen easily. comfortable to wear and adjust and doesn't restrict your movement of the arm!
customer_reviews.author: sumit

customer_reviews.title: this thing works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I've been to the dr the Nero surgeon, physical therapy had MRI they say there is nothing wrong physically NOT true i bought this thing and it really works my sciatic nerve pain is well under control and for those that have it know what i say when i say it is agony pain and i don't like taking hydrocodone all the time for pain control i do use this support and wear it all the times for days at a time it works
customer_reviews.author: oboy

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiple of this
customer_reviews.text: This is good for keeping your shoulder stable during sports and such (if you tend to dislocate like me then this can add some security) It is not good for trying to correct posture since it tends to pull the shoulders into your torso for stability rather than pull them back.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Yes. It works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Really helped me recover from a serious shoulder strain. Reduced the constant, nagging pain to a manageable level. Helped me sleep. I'm very glad I have it, as I understand that injuries like this can easily repeat themselves once it's happened the first time. I'm 65 years old, and this was a huge help. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JamesOtis

customer_reviews.title: Didnt think it possible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brace because I have arthritis in my left hip. Most of the time I cannot even walk through the grocery store without being in severe pain. I wore the brace to do my shopping and was surprised at how well it worked. I told my doctor about it and she said she was going to pass it on to her other patients as she did not know a hip brace existed.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, yet provides stability.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I decided to start bowling again after almost a decade of his being on the disabled list, with two knee surgeries, a back surgery and cataract surgeries. Rotater cuff problems run in all the females on my mother's side. Not wanting to have any problems, my husband ordered this brace for me. It works great. It's so comfortable, I forget I'm even wearing it; yet I haven't had so much as a twinge in the shoulder while sending my 13 pound ball down the alley!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: I dislocated my left arm recently and basically was told now that it is disclocated, will easily dislocate again. My intentions on buying this is to at least prevent it from happening. Wearing it, gives me the impression I am secure. My shoulder seems to move better at least feels more stable with it on
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as he was experiencing stubborn shoulder pain for a couple of days. The product arrive the next day and I was hoping it fit well on my husband who is a large man with broad shoulders and arms. To our surprise it was a perfect fit and he said it was comfortable. He wore it under his shirt at work the next day and said it helped to relieve his pain and discomfort. The price was good and the brace is made well. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tricky to learn how to put it on. The directions could be a little more detailed. I had a hard time putting it on myself. It was bought for my father who is 77. I'm going to have to help him put it on. I'm not sure how it's going to go because we have not tried yet. I'll update my review when I have more experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do anything for my shoulder. Doesn’t stay in place, doesn’t fit comfortably. Too lose so it doesn’t give any compression at all.. returning
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gee

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and adjustability of it. Feels slightly bulky, but not really in a bad way. Can't really tell if it's actually helping with the pain or not, but that's mostly user errors. I like the fact that I can slide my ice/heat pack in it. Helps a lot when I'm working. Only issue I do have is that it will occasionally rub against my under arm, but I may just have to adjust it slightly. All in all, a good buy for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoulder brace for the price
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it was purchased for. I had a minor pain in my shoulder, likely from a fall, that seemed to be tendon related (rather than joint damage). Wearing this brace seems to be alleviating the stress enough for healing. It also does seem to breathe, as there was no sweating under the brace when I've worn it. It was received quickly and there have been no issues with it. (No bad smell, fits perfectly, etc.) I have not used it with an ice pack yet and haven't slept with it on. I am able to wear it both under my clothes and over a t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hermann

customer_reviews.title: relieves pain at a labour intensive job
customer_reviews.text: This brace does wonders for my shoulder. I use intermittently at work. When ever my shoulder feels strained. This brace supply's almost immediate pain relief
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy please
customer_reviews.text: READ BEFORE YOU BUY The velcro is trash and just falls off if you move around. The strap is way too long. Quality is so bad..... 0 stars
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have a partially torn labrum, and the brace does a little bit for my chronic pain or range of motion but not much. Plus, it doesn’t fit that well or go far enough down the bicep for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Pinched nerve in my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I have a pinched nerve and have been wearing this to my workouts. It seems to be helping. Not sure if it's really working, or just makes me more aware of my shoulder. This really is a temporary thing and not to be worn forever, but I'm happy for now.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Packaging good, product good quality strong and sturdy, manual with instructions good, my one and only problem it was to large for me even after making adjustments,I’m female with small shoulders. Not that it couldn’t fit a woman, just didn’t fit me.Otherwise it’s a good product and I found nothing else wrong.
customer_reviews.author: 1lord

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder brace is well made but it has very stiff plastic tabs on the velcro straps. These plastic tabs cut into your body terribly. I couldn't wear it more than a few minutes! Even over a shirt it cut badly. Poor design!! Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Suuligan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit, Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I did find it a bit challenging to put on, especially trying to find the right fit around the arm one-handed, but after a couple tries, I was in business. It's quite comfortable once it's on, & it really cradles the shoulder snugly to help prevent further injury.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Breathable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable!! I really like this shoulder brace. It is super comfortable. I even sleep in it! The fabric is breathable and it is easy to adjust and put on. I have only worn it twice and I can tell it has helped my shoulder some already.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: No bad.
customer_reviews.text: My son is really skinny so it when the arm is wrapped it almost goes around twice. At least it isn't rubbing in his armpit. My husband tried this one and another brand and this was a bit more comfortable because it does Velcro close to the armpit.
customer_reviews.author: Dubugz

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Better than nothing? I don't want to spend my entire day pulling and adjusting this brace. Rotator cuff is the most difficult joint to wrap and this brace makes it worse. No real fit at the shoulder. Try to tighten it and it hikes up and shifts sideways. Worse purchase I've made in 1.5 yrs. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeanne Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Do your research!
customer_reviews.text: The support is great and helps a lot with my sciatic pain. However, my doctor warned against using the product for extended use. After time, your body adjusts to the support and it can actually weaken your muscles. I will definitely use this on busy days, or days where I just can't cope with the pain, but I wish that there was some type of disclosure for muscle weakening with prolonged use. Other than that, the product serves its purpose. It's comfortable, supportive and hides well under clothes, and the velcro is extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Support for a Brace
customer_reviews.text: This product is 100% useless as a support or brace. If you need something to hold an ice pack, I suppose it's fine. But the only thing it accomplishes is being uncomfortable and chafing. If you need actual support look elsewhere. I'll be returning this and ordering the EVS brace.
customer_reviews.author: WNCmotard

customer_reviews.title: Nearly useless
customer_reviews.text: Fits poorly. Uncomfortable, ineffective, poorly designed, difficult to adjust. Does not provide pain relief. I plan to return it. Hi I'm
customer_reviews.author: TMART

customer_reviews.title: Temper your expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would support my shoulder while playing pickleball, it did not. It might be okay if you’re walking around but not if your playing sports.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Heilman

customer_reviews.title: A great product that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I pulled a groin muscle for the first time in my life and couldn't believe how painful and debilitating it was. After a couple of days I decided I had to find some relief. I went on line and found the groin support by BaboCare. I ordered it and it arrived the next day! I put it on and immediately was able to move without the sharp pain I'd been experiencing up till then. Two days later, while eearing it, I'm out hiking again. I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Breard

customer_reviews.title: Need engineer to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: 3 of us tried to put this together & were unsuccessful. Too complicated. Never used.
customer_reviews.author: O. Hasemann

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I'm left handed and I do a lot of lifting and pulling. My left shoulder began to ache and get very sore. I thought maybe I had pulled something. I saw this brace and thought I'd give it a try before I go in and see a doctor about it. I had used a brace on my knee before and it worked. I got the brace and began to wear it and now the soreness is going away after only a few days. It's light and comfortable to wear underneath my clothes and is easy to adjust. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DollarStoreStuff

customer_reviews.title: It bunches up
customer_reviews.text: It bunches up around the sides at the top and the bottom. I think it may do so less for someone with a bigger arm. It would likely benefit from making a small and a large. A one size fits all is tough.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Don't notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: I don't notice a difference with this but it could just be me. I actually bought a posture corrector and it helped me out better than this cuz my right shoulder was getting sore from scanning as an ultrasound tech. So i don't think I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rose harding

customer_reviews.title: Looking for: Stability & Pressure
customer_reviews.text: After many years of custodial work, I found myself suffering from what turned out to be partial tearing of shoulder tendons on my dominant arm. While in therapy I came across this product on the internet and one of the comments got my attention. This product does exactly what I was looking for! Whatever discomfort you may encounter will override the presence of pain, anytime!
customer_reviews.author: emipraiseJC

customer_reviews.title: Worked exactly as I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a big difference in the process of healing from my muscle and ligament tears in my right shoulder. Once I got the arm cuff piece sized right for me, and made the back strap a constant fit also...then it was supah easy on-off by myself and only needed to adjust using the front strap. I was glad for the extra tension I could adjust on the outside of the shoulder section. Sometimes I needed more tension... other times I jus needed my arm braced, but could release the tension on the shoulder section. Works for me!
customer_reviews.author: fotogrrl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So , I purchased this for my father and he told me on many occasions the snap that goes under his other arm keep coming off . They won’t stay attached .He only had it for not even a week and it won’t stay attach . Looking to return this item .
customer_reviews.author: Martine Galliotte

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: A shoulder support that provides zero support. Build quality is fine but totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: The shoulder support doesn't seem to fit people with large ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder support doesn't seem to fit people with large arms and someone who has a larger upper body. It seems to be made for people who fit the models description for men. Maybe it would work for others but it cut into the skin in a very uncomfortable way and it seemed to be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kila Mamoru

product_meta.title: Babo Care Shoulder Stability Brace with Pressure Pad Light and Breathable Neoprene Shoulder Support for Rotator Cuff, Dislocated AC Joint, Labrum Tear, Shoulder Pain, Shoulder Compression Sleeve
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

 Most shoulder problems fall into four major categories:

 

(1) Tendon inflammation (bursitis or tendinitis) or tendon tear

 (2) Instability

 (3) Arthritis

 (4) Fracture (broken bone)

 Other much less common causes of shoulder pain are tumors, infection, and nerve-related problems. 

 Anatomy: 

 

 Your shoulder is made up of three bones: your upper arm bone (humerus), your shoulder blade (scapula), and your collarbone (clavicle).

The head of your upper arm bone fits into a rounded socket in your shoulder blade. This socket is called the glenoid. A combination of muscles and tendons keeps your arm bone centered in your shoulder socket. These tissues are called the rotator cuff. They cover the head of your upper arm bone and attach it to your shoulder blade. 

 The Ultimate Buyers Guide to Shoulder Braces

 

A shoulder brace is a sling-like device designed to support and strengthen your shoulder. Shoulder braces are not for day-to-day use, but rather for individuals who have experienced a shoulder injury. 

 A shoulder brace can be used to heal your shoulder quickly and avoid such damage. Unlike a basic sling, shoulder braces provide stronger, more reliable support.

As your rehab progresses, a shoulder brace can be used to increase “proprioception”—your sense of how your body is positioned. 



 if you are not 100% satisfied with the shoulder brace you have bought you can simply return them and get you money back. 

 Click "Add to Cart" NOW And Purchase Your Own Babo Care Shoulder Brace.
feature_bullets: 1, PRESSURE PAD FOR ICE OR HOT: If you address your shoulder tendonitis early enough, you can follow on your own are: Rest, Ice and Posture. We design a pressure pad for ice pack, and detail is in the Users Manual (NOTE: not include ice pack)

2, STRONGER AND RELIABLE SUPPORT: Babo Care shoulder brace provide stronger, more reliable support, it can help: Speed up the recovery process, Protect your shoulder from further injury, Provide compression(which may enhance the receptors in your skin and help your brain better understand the position of your shoulder.)

3, TWO WAY ADJUSTING: Easily adjustable and strong Velcro straps and high quality plastic buckle design for adjusting on right or left shoulder, both for men and women. Adult size( Arm size: 9.8''-16.1'', Chest size: 33''- 45'')
4, BREATHABLE NEOPRENE: Babo Care shoulder brace can be worn to recover from your shoulder injury or to ease discomfort.

5, 45-DAYS MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: Try our products/services for 45 days and see what happens for you - we think you'll be pleasantly surprised. If you are not 100% satisfied, contact us, we will offer you a full refund of the original purchase price for up to 45 days
